::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard KitKat cry out. He stood there just waiting, and watching
her.

::K-9::

K-9 cintinued to run through the land, hopeing he would not be attacked.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod stood by Kamodia and ArcAngel. He just glared up, into the sky.
